# [FEAT] Single Sign-On (SSO)

## Labels
`security`, `user-management`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement Single Sign-On (SSO) for seamless authentication with enterprise identity providers.

## Requirements

### SSO Protocols
- SAML 2.0
- OpenID Connect (OIDC)
- OAuth 2.0
- JWT authentication

### Identity Providers
- Azure AD
- Okta
- Google Workspace
- OneLogin
- ADFS
- Custom SAML IdPs

### SSO Configuration
- IdP metadata import
- Certificate management
- Attribute mapping
- Default role mapping
- Organization mapping
- JIT provisioning

### User Experience
- SSO login button
- IdP-initiated login
- SP-initiated login
- Password fallback (optional)
- Mobile SSO

### Agent SSO
- Agent workspace SSO
- Admin center SSO
- API authentication via SSO
- Session management

### End User SSO
- Help center SSO
- Customer portal SSO
- Social login
- Magic links

### Security
- Certificate rotation
- Session timeout
- Force re-authentication
- IP restrictions
- MFA integration

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports Single Sign-On for enterprise authentication needs.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] SAML SSO works
- [ ] OIDC SSO works
- [ ] Major IdPs supported
- [ ] JIT provisioning functional
- [ ] Session management works
